channel.title: [ERROR] Could not find or load main class! -_-
channel.description:
ok just jared my client.. but i dont have "EGUI" or even "EGU" in my client files... so i cant create this "manifest" text file...
how can i fix it?

item.title: [ERROR] Could not find or load main class! -_-
item.dc:creator: @dzeko dzeko
item.description:
@dzeko wrote:

lol…
none of these videos will help me…

my problem is when i create the client.jar file and then try to run it it gives me
“Could not find or load main class: client. Program will exit!”

i’ve try to replace the “client” by: “Client”, “Client.class”, “client.class”… but same shit… :eek:

Read full topic

item.title: [ERROR] Could not find or load main class! -_-
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

[quote=“dzeko, post:1, topic:438470”]ok just jared my client…
but i dont have “EGUI” or even “EGU” in my client files…
so i cant create this “manifest” text file…

how can i fix it?[/quote]

Sound like you watched the youtube video of that guy that hasn’t got a broken voice and doesn’t know anything. “EGUI” & “EGU” files are not necessary. I have “GUI” and thats ok., i think most servers have that.

This might help: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SXrCiAnq9dk[/youtube]
part two is here: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m9m-Zg7vvGI[/youtube]

Read full topic
